title: Doccano_nginx_1 error  Cannot start service nginx
body:
How to solve the for doccano_nginx_1 error
---------
 I tried to install doccano according to the provided installation guide:
$ git clone https://github.com/doccano/doccano.git
$ cd doccano
$ docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up

```
    Successfully built ba96d6789d75
    Successfully tagged doccano_nginx:latest
    WARNING: Image for service nginx was built because it did not already exist. To rebuild this image you must use `docker- 
    compose build` or `docker-compose up --build`.
    Creating doccano_frontend_1 ... done                                                                                                                                                         
    Creating doccano_postgres_1 ... done                                                                                                                                                         
    Creating doccano_backend_1  ... done                                                                                                                                                         
    Creating doccano_nginx_1    ...
    Creating doccano_nginx_1    ... error                                                                                                                                                        
    ERROR: for doccano_nginx_1  Cannot start service nginx: driver failed programming external connectivity on endpoint 
    doccano_nginx_1 (ef148ccc254f7354ae605779d32509d91f883578a6d999980bba87d4e6190b33): Bind for 0.0.0.0:80 failed: 
    port is already allocated 
```

Your Environment
---------

*   Operating System: Windows 10
*   Python Version Used: 3.6
*   When you install doccano: Installed doccano 1 month ago, but the error happened today using docker compose
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): clone git
